event.title: ADempiere Japan Users Group / the 19th seminar
event.catch: 日本ADempiere ユーザー会 / 第19回勉強会
event.description:
Time Table

  1. Opening (はじめに)

    • Recent Movements (最近の動き)
  2. Intro Part (導入編)

    • ADempiereのご紹介
  3. ADempiere-related Topic (ADempiere関連トピック)

    • Comparison between ADempiere and Oracle EBS
  4. Business/System Part (業務/システム編)

    • Basics of Japanese tax accounting (税務会計の基本)
    • ADempiere3.4 ERP Solutions

      • Chap.7 Accounting Information and configuration (会計情報と設定)
  5. Wrap Up (まとめ)

    • future plan (今後の予定)
    • Q/A
  6. Networking (懇親会)

Materials (unfinished)

Slide(ppt)
Starter’s Guide(doc)

Registration Fee (参加料)

free (無料)
event.place: Waseda University (早稲田大学　１１号館 912教室)
